comment.language: The Morning Doxology is prayed after the First hour of the Agpeya every day. As for any of the Lord’s Feasts and Apocalypse Saturday, it is prayed after the Thanksgiving prayer of the Morning Raising of Incense, from “We Worship the Father (Tenouwst)” to “Through their prayers (Hiten noueu,/).” The remaining part is prayed after the Prayer of the Sick in the Morning Raising of Incense.

Doksologi Pagi didoakan setelah Jam Pertama dari Agpeya setiap hari. Sedangkan pada hari-hari raya Tuhan dan Sabtu Apokalipsis, didoakan setelah Doa Syukur dalam Kebaktian Dupa Pagi, mulai dari “Kami menyembah Bapa (Tenouwst)” hingga “Melalui doa-doa mereka (Hiten noueu,/).” Bagian sisanya didoakan setelah Doa untuk Orang Sakit dalam Kebaktian Dupa Pagi.
